nodes.text: Ree-Yees's camera was a custom made three-eye camera used by the criminal Ree-Yees to accommodate his Gran physiology. He enjoyed visiting other planets via Star Tours, and often brought his camera to take pictures, despite flash photography not being allowed.

Ree-Yees's camera can be seen in the onboard safety video for Disney's original Star Tours ride. In the video, Ree-Yees is breaking the rules by smoking and using flash photography. He was played in the safety video by long time Disneyland cast member and costume character expert Craig Smith. Ree-Yees was also included in a 2010 Star Tours Boarding Party action figure set with the three-eyed camera seen in the video; the packaging confirms his identity.
